message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10500. This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $10000. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
